alert.note: Alert for Beaufort (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 6:28PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Beaufort County through 715 PM EDT... At 628 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over River Road, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Washington, River Road, Belhaven, Ransomville, Scranton, Pamlico Beach, Lowland, Bunyan, Winsteadville, Core Point, Bayview, Sidney Crossroads, Yeatesville, Aurora Ferry Terminal, Goose Creek State Park, Bayview Ferry Terminal, Washington Park and Sydney Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
